channel.title: From Bits to Bytes | Cybersecurity Insights by Bhavik Kanejiya
channel.description: Recent content on From Bits to Bytes | Cybersecurity Insights by Bhavik Kanejiya

image.title: From Bits to Bytes | Cybersecurity Insights by Bhavik Kanejiya

item.title: HTB Boardlight Walkthrough
item.description: Step-by-step HTB Boardlight walkthrough featuring enumeration, Dolibarr RCE (CVE-2023-30253), and root via Enlightenment CVE-2022-37706.

item.title: Kubernetes Security Basics: From a Pentester’s Point of View
item.description: Explore Kubernetes security from a pentester’s point of view. Follow a hands-on walkthrough from reconnaissance to root access, focusing on network packet analysis, exploitation techniques, and cluster misconfigurations

item.title: HTB Cap Walkthrough
item.description: Explore an in-depth walkthrough of the HTB Cap machine, focusing on network packet analysis and leveraging captured data for exploitation. Follow each step from initial reconnaissance to achieving root access, emphasizing practical network security techniques

item.title: HTB TwoMillion Walkthrough
item.description: Explore an in-depth walkthrough of the HTB Cap machine, focusing on network packet analysis and leveraging captured data for exploitation. Follow each step from initial reconnaissance to achieving root access, emphasizing practical network security techniques

item.title: Let’s do a peek inside the admin dashboard - Abuse API endpoint
item.description: Discover a broken access control vulnerability in a popular productivity app with over 2 million users. This post details how an employee gained limited admin privileges by manipulating the API’s workspace ID, including steps to reproduce the exploit.
